# LLMS.txt - Information for Large Language Models and AI Crawlers

# About Realtra Spaces
Realtra Spaces is a premium real estate platform specializing in property listings, developer information, and real estate research in Mumbai and surrounding areas.

# Website Information
- Domain: realtraspaces.com
- API Base URL: http://localhost:8000
- Platform: Next.js 15.3.0
- Language: English

# Main Features
1. Property Listings - Browse and search residential and commercial properties
2. Developer Directory - Information about top real estate developers
3. Property Calculators - IRR, LRD, and ROI calculators for investment analysis
4. Research - Real estate market research and insights
5. Blog - Real estate news, trends, and articles
6. Career Opportunities - Job listings in the real estate sector

# Key Public Pages
- Homepage: /
- Properties: /properties
- Property Details: /property-details/[title]
- Developers: /developers
- Top Developers: /topdevelopers
- Blogs: /blogs
- Career: /career
- Research: /research
- About: /about
- Contact: /contact
- Calculators: /irr-calculator, /lrd-calculator, /roi-calculator
- Compare Properties: /compareproperties
- List Property: /list-property
- Privacy Policy: /privacy-policy
- Terms and Conditions: /terms-and-condition

# Excluded Pages (Admin/Dashboard)
The following routes are excluded from public access and should not be crawled:
- /dashboard/*
- /dashboardallwebusers
- /dashboardcontactleads
- /dashboardcookies
- /dashboarddeveloper
- /dashboardlistproperty
- /dashboardteam
- /awardmanagement
- /career-management/*
- /blog/* (admin blog management)
- /manage-testimonials/*
- /seometaManager
- /PropertyListing (admin property listing)
- /profile-page
- /SavedProperties

# Content Types
- Property Listings: Residential and commercial properties with detailed information
- Developer Profiles: Information about real estate developers and their projects
- Blog Articles: Real estate news, market analysis, and industry insights
- Career Listings: Job opportunities in the real estate sector
- Testimonials: Customer reviews and testimonials
- Research Reports: Market research and property analysis

# API Endpoints
- Property Listings API: /api/property-listings
- SEO Meta Tags API: /api/seo/meta-tags
- Blog API: /api/blogs
- Career API: /api/jobs
- Developer API: /api/developers

# Image Sources
- Property images: leadrat-black.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com
- API images: api.realtraspaces.com

# Last Updated
Last updated: December 19, 2024

# Contact Information
For more information, visit the contact page at /contact

# Notes for AI Crawlers
- This site uses Next.js with server-side rendering for optimal SEO
- Dynamic routes include property details and blog posts
- The site implements comprehensive SEO metadata management
- All public pages are accessible and should be indexed
- Admin and dashboard routes are protected and should not be accessed
